name: Benta Bangle - Bright Red
description:
Benta Bangle, Bright Red

Meet our newest addition, The Benta Bangle - 4 notches of beading gives our classic design just the right amount of edge. 

Inspired by traditional Maasai beading, this double-notch bangle is a polished, contemporary work of art.  They look stunning worn alone or mixed with any of our other designs. 

Handmade from recycled aluminum and glass Czech seed beads.

Each bangle is engraved with the Mikuti logo.

Hand made in Kenya.

name: Ceres Bangle - Purple Lemon
description:
Ceres Bangle, Purple Lemon

The Ceres Bangle - Purple Lemon

The collection of Ceres Bangles celebrates our love of color.  Using our special wrapping technique, we combine White, Yellow, and Dark Purple beads. Classic match for any spring outfit. 

Inspired by traditional Maasai beading, this colorful, double-notch bangle is a polished, contemporary work of art.  They look stunning worn alone or mixed with others.

Handmade from recycled aluminum and glass Czech seed beads.

Each bangle is engraved with the Mikuti logo.

Hand made in Kenya.

name: Ceres Bangle - Morning Sun
description:
The Ceres Bangle, Morning Sun

The collection of Ceres Bangles celebrates our love of color.  Using our special wrapping technique, we combine Orange, White, and Yellow beads. Greet your morning arm party with this cheerful edition. 

Inspired by traditional Maasai beading, this colorful, double-notch bangle is a polished, contemporary work of art.  They look stunning worn alone or mixed with others.

Handmade from recycled aluminum and glass Czech seed beads.

Each bangle is engraved with the Mikuti logo.

Hand made in Kenya.

description:

name: White Horn Agape Pendant
description:
This seductive, stunning, simple white horn and brass pendant will leave people wondering who you are. 

Strung on high-quality greek leather cord (Color: Iris Blue), hangs at 18.5 inches, (at it's longest).  Finished with an adjustable slipknot for easy wearing.

Black Horn is sourced from Uganda.
Brass piece is sourced from Kenya. 

Product is hand-finished in Kenya.

name: White Horn Credence Pendant
description:
For the idealist dreamer in all of us. Keep dressing for your dreams. 

This seductive, stunning, simple white horn and brass pendant will leave people wondering who you are.

Strung on high-quality greek leather cord (Color: Iris Blue), hangs at 18.5 inches, (at it's longest). Finished with an adjustable slipknot for easy wearing.

Horn is sourced from Uganda. 
Brass piece is sourced from Kenya.

Product is hand-finished in Kenya.

name: White Horn Chevron
description:
We've combined the timeless Chevron with the natural blend of white horn, making each of one these statement piece unique. 

The necklace looks cozy over a sweater or sharp with a strapless LBD. 

Strung on high quality black greek leather, necklace hangs at 16 inches and is adjustable with a finished slipknot. 

Made in Uganda.

name: White Horn Tempest Pendant
description:
For the wild thing who prefers a more natural pallet - this one is for you. The brass is stunning on top of the natural and carmel colors, creating a contrast for the untamed. 

Strung on high-quality greek leather cord (Color: Iris Blue), hangs at 18.5 inches, (at it's longest).  Finished with an adjustable slipknot for easy wearing.

Black Horn is sourced from Uganda.
Brass piece is sourced from Kenya. 

Product is hand-finished in Kenya.

name: Trapezoid Shield Pendant
description:
This personal piece of armor is just the right size for demanding attention.  It's an all-around, every day wear.   

Hand-casted in Nairobi, pendant measures at 2 inches in length, finished on natural high-quality Greek leather with a slip knot for your adjustment. 

Made in Kenya.

name: Black Horn Agape Pendant
description:
Sometimes we need to be provocative. This piece has just the right amount of tease. 

Strung on high-quality greek leather cord (Color: Deep Berry), hangs at 18.5 inches, (at it's longest). Finished with an adjustable slipknot for easy wearing.

Black Horn is sourced from Uganda. 
Brass piece is sourced from Kenya.

Product is hand-finished in Kenya.

name: Kilolo Bracelet
description: The Kilolo Bracelet is named after our favorite neighborhood in Uganda. This classic bracelet is the perfect adornment for any lady.

name: Black Horn Credence Pendant
description:
Accept and believe your own truth. Accessorize authenticity with this stunner.  Black and gold contrast at its best. 

Strung on high-quality greek leather cord (Color: Deep Berry), hangs at 18.5 inches, (at it's longest).  Finished with an adjustable slipknot for easy wearing.

Black Horn is sourced from Uganda.
Brass piece is sourced from Kenya. 

Product is hand-finished in Kenya.

name: Novet Cuff
description:
Created with a special weaving technique, the Novet Cuff sits 3 inches high and will make a bold statement when worn. The weave highlights the variety of neutral and black shades found within the banana bark, making every one truly unique. 

available in S/M and M/L

Due to the color variations of the banana bark and the weaving technique used, every bracelet varies between shades.

name: The Perfect Stack All Dressed Up
description:
Our original banana bark bracelets have been all dressed up with local Tanzania wax fabric.  Made with our unique wrapping technique, the vibrant colors of the fabric enhance the natural earth tones of the bark, creating delicious arm candy! 

These bracelets come in stacks of 3, packaged together. 


Due to the color variations of the banana bark, fabric, and the wrapping technique used, every bracelet varies between shades.


Comes in sizes: S/M or M/L

name: The Perfect Stack
description:
Sass, Sophistication, and Swag all in one! We've put together the perfect threesome. Pile these bangles up your arm for a dramatic look and make a gorgeous statement! 

These bracelets come in stacks of 3, packaged together. 


Due to the color variations of the banana bark and the wrapping technique used, every bracelet varies between shades.


Comes in sizes: S/M or M/L
